title: Update site branding logo and company contact/address details

requirements.text: Add the user-provided logo image `frgmtlogo.png` to the frontend static assets (under `frontend/public/assets/`) and replace the current header branding (icon + “GlobalFreight”) with this logo image and the company name “Di Logisolutions”. The header logo must link to the Home page and render correctly in both light and dark themes.

quotes: change the logo to attached png file.

acceptanceCriteria: A new static asset exists at a stable public path (e.g., `/assets/frgmtlogo.png` or similar) that matches the uploaded `frgmtlogo.png`.
The header shows the new logo image instead of the current Package icon block and no longer displays “GlobalFreight”.
The company name displayed in the header is “Di Logisolutions”.
Header branding remains visible/legible in both light and dark theme modes.

requirements.text: Update company/contact details everywhere they appear in the UI (footer and contact details components at minimum) to use the exact user-provided information: Office Address: “Di LOGISOLUTIONS, A89, ROAD NO 2, MAHIPALPUR, NEW DELHI,110037”; Phone: “+91-9568740074” and “011-41447376”; Email: “info@dilss.in”; Company name: “Di Logisolution”; Registered address: “RZK-2/326-I, Khasra No. 85/17, Block K-2, Nihal Vihar, Nangaloi, West Delhi, Delhi, 11004”.

The Contact page details card(s) show the updated email, phone number(s), and office address exactly as provided.

requirements.text: Replace remaining “GlobalFreight” brand mentions in marketing copy headings/titles (e.g., Home/About hero headings and “Why Choose …” section headings) with the updated company branding so the site consistently reflects “Di Logisolutions/Di Logisolution” rather than “GlobalFreight”.

quotes: Company name: Di Logisolution ... update these detais

acceptanceCriteria: No prominent header/footer or page hero titles display the old brand name “GlobalFreight”.
Key headings that previously referenced the old brand are updated to the new branding while keeping the overall page structure unchanged.

constraints: Do not modify any files in the immutable frontend paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/main.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, and `frontend/src/components/ui`).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
Do not introduce new backend canisters/services; changes are frontend-only for branding/contact info.
nonGoals: Do not implement new functional features (e.g., payments, user accounts, tracking enhancements) as part of this change.
Do not redesign the entire site theme/layout beyond what is required to display the new logo and updated details.
